column2: Construction Partners, Inc. engages in construction of roadways and highways. The company is headquartered in Dothan, Alabama and currently employs 628 full-time employees. The firm is specialized in the construction and maintenance of transportation networks in the United States. The company provides construction products and services to both public and private infrastructure projects. The company focuses on transportation infrastructure projects that include highways, roads, bridges, airports, and commercial and residential sites in the Southeastern United States. The firm also offers range of large site work construction and hot mix asphalt paving services to commercial and residential developers, and other local businesses.
